channel.title: Where can I find this
channel.description:
Hello, I am editing my server and I need to know how to change what it says for like the title of the quest tab. Like for my title is says "Universal X", and where the quests would be it says all the quests. Can anyone help me with where I would be able to find them. I looked for them under client.java, player.java, and playerhandler.java (I have been looking in my source files for this). Soo if anyone could tell me where I would be able to find them that would be great.
Thanks!

item.title: Where can I find this
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

b b0yz 4:

Thanks guys!

No Problemo.

Read full topic

item.title: Where can I find this
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Skill09 Mod Skill09
item.description:
@Mod_Skill09 wrote:

Yes, Texthandler or client.java, and you can also change what NPC’s say in NPCHandler.java just incase you wanted to know xD

Read full topic
